subdisciplines.name: Traffic Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of traffic flow, safety, and management on roads, highways, and other transportation infrastructure.

subdisciplines.name: Transportation Planning
subdisciplines.description: The process of developing plans and policies to manage the movement of people and goods, including land use and infrastructure development.

subdisciplines.name: Intelligent Transportation Systems
subdisciplines.description: The use of advanced technologies to improve the safety and efficiency of transportation systems, including traffic management, public transportation, and freight movement.

subdisciplines.name: Transportation Infrastructure Development
subdisciplines.description: The design, construction, and maintenance of transportation infrastructure, including highways, bridges, airports, and transit systems.

subdisciplines.name: Transport Economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the allocation of resources in the transportation sector, including pricing, cost-benefit analysis, and investment analysis.
